name: Korong
description: Control circling white dots, send them upwards from one gravity zone to another. Dots can leave their orbital course around the gravity zones in a tangent line. Just tap or drag the gravity zone. Dragging slows down time. You can control more dots simultaneously, bounce from obstacles, hit shrinking boxes and switches. To achieve higher scores you should avoid loosing your "herd of white dots", not hitting the sidewalls or the spiky obstacles, and not leaving them behind!
